title: Meteor
alt: No, only LAVA is called 'magma' while underground. Any other object underground is called 'lava'.
transcript:
[Cueballs friend walks toward Cueball while holding a rock.]
Friend: Check it out - I got a piece of a meteor!
Cueball: Actually, it's only called that while falling. Once it lands, it's called magma.[Below the panel:]
My Hobby: Mixing pedantic terms
